p: We next performed single sample GSEA analysis using the log2 fold-change values of each patient compared to the group of healthy controls as ranks and the BTMs as gene sets ( S4 Fig). Similar to the results presented in Fig 2, we observed that the up-regulated BTMs were related to innate immunity and antiviral responses involving dendritic cells and monocytes activation. This is highly consistent with the work of Michlmayr et al [ 35].
